name: Escape from Sarandungui
description:
Game made in 24 hours for a game jam.

Defend your rocket until it's finished, then escape from Sarandungui.

Left click to select units, right click to attack with the selected units.

Assets by Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-kit

Source code: https://github.com/rhomita/escape-from-sarandungui
